CronJobDetail.name: CronJobDetail
CronJobDetail.description: Contains details about the associated scheduled job, such as the job’s name and type.

JobType.description: The type of the associated scheduled job. The following are the available job types. Use the job type value when querying for a specific job type. 1—Data Export 3—Dashboard Refresh 4—Reporting Snapshot 6—Scheduled Flow 7—Scheduled Apex 8—Report Run 9—Batch Job A—Reporting Notification

Name.description: The name of the associated scheduled job.
